<h1 align="center">
  Gatsby Site for DBS UX Engineer Test
</h1>

## How to run the file:

1.  **Run file**

    Clone and navigate to the folder to start it up.

    ```shell
    cd dbs-website-prototype/
    gatsby develop
    ```

2.  **Test the website in dev environment**

    Site should now be running at `http://localhost:8000`!

## What other things are inside the folder?

* I'm using Tailwindcss for generating utilities classes -  `https://tailwindcss.com/`
* Storyset from Freepik for illustrations - `https://storyset.com/`

<!-- AUTO-GENERATED-CONTENT:END -->
